name: Oliphaunt
description: The Oliphaunt is a gargantuan beast known for its immense strength and formidable presence on the battlefield, characterized by its massive size and trunk.
memorable: The Oliphaunt can trample foes and grapple enemies with its powerful trunk, serving as a living tank.
goals: Often used in combat scenarios to dominate the battlefield and overpower opponents.
relations: Related to other large beasts and may be encountered together with similar creatures in combat.
environment: Typically found in areas where it can charge at enemies, often in forested or open terrains.
strengths: Exceptional Strength score enables it to deliver devastating melee attacks and control the battlefield.
weaknesses: Very low Dexterity makes it cumbersome and vulnerable to agile attacks.
attacks: Uses its trunk to grapple, followed by either a powerful gore or stomp attack, all while also having a wide area attack with Tusk Sweep.
most_powerful_ability: The Oliphaunt's Trampling Charge can knock enemies prone, allowing for a subsequent attack.
senses: Has passive Perception of 10, which is average for a creature of its kind.
additional_information: Can execute a Multiattack with its trunk and melee attacks.
Has a high Strength of 27, enabling it to hit hard and effectively.
Possesses a charge ability that enhances its offensive capabilities.
Resilient with a Constitution of 23, contributing to its overall durability.
Lacks magical abilities, focusing entirely on brute strength.
test_queries: gargantuan creature with a powerful trunk
battle tank creature with impressive melee attacks
strong beast that can trample foes
